description:
Though it often plays a symbolic role such as attending memorial ceremonies, this machine`s characteristics have been comprehensively reviewed now that McGillis has become commander of the Outer Earth Orbit Regulatory Joint Fleet. In particular, its ground combat data has been recalculated, enabling the machine to make maximum use of its mobility under Earth`s gravity.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: EB-06r Graze Ritter (McGillis Ki)
